name: placket
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an opening in a piece of clothing where it fastens or where there is a pocket, or the piece of cloth that is sewn under the opening : The pattern is carefully matched at the pocket and placket. Shirt details include half sleeves, buttondown collar, and 7-button placket.
Pornpawit Phosawang/EyeEm/Getty Images /GettyImages
